#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>
#include <cassert>
#include <cstring>
#include <cstdlib>
#include <algorithm>
#include <vector>
#include <cmath>

using namespace std;


int main()
{
    int nCase;
    scanf("%d",&nCase);
    while(nCase--)
    {
       int x,y;
       scanf("%d %d",&x,&y);
       if(x==0 && y==0) printf("0\n");
       else printf("%d\n",(x/2)+(y/2)+1);
    }
    //system("pause");
    return 0;  
}
